body: Honestly, I don't know why I haven't left the forums yet. I left the server about three months ago but I stuck around on the forums for some reason. Most of my old friends have left or became virtually inactive. I guess it was just this awesome community that kept me around for so long, but I knew I'd have to let go and move on at some point. Anyways, thanks everyone for giving me this amazing experience in my life, and always being very friendly to me. Goodbye everyone! o/
body_tagged: Honestly, I don't know why I haven't left the forums yet. I left the server about three months ago but I stuck around on the forums for some reason. Most of my old friends have left or became virtually inactive. I guess it was just this awesome community that kept me around for so long, but I knew I'd have to let go and move on at some point. Anyways, thanks everyone for giving me this amazing experience in my life, and always being very friendly to me. Goodbye everyone! o/

replies.body:
Turtle, you've always been a brother to me in my eyes. When I first met you, you were so calm, collected, chill, and funny. You've always been that way. And to be honest, you won that shirtless war, bro <3 but on top of everything, you've truly been one of my best friends on this server for a long, long time. Take care. I'll miss you, a lot.

-Jake <3
